features: 💯【6D Upgraded Shaver Heads】Head shavers for bald men adopt 6D floating shaver heads, which not only increase the usable area of the shaver but also fit the contours of the face and grasp the hair very well. With the powerful motor and sharp blades, it can achieve a comfortable and smooth shaving experience.

✅【6 in 1 Grooming Kit Head Shaver for Men】The multifunctional head shaver comes with 5 attachments: a rotary shaver, a hair clipper, a nose/ear hair trimmer, a facial cleansing brush, a face massage, and 3 limit combs(3/5/7mm). All-in-one Kit satisfies all your hair trimming and facial care needs.

👍【Intelligent LED Display】Smart LED reminds you of the power level to charge the electric shaver. The travel lock avoids additional power consumption. And the cleaning reminder informs you to clean. The shaver for men can still provide excellent shaving performance even when the battery is low.

💦【IPX6 Waterproof Wet & Dry Razors】The shavers for men adopt IPX6 waterproof technology,the entire body is washable,satisfy both wet and dry use. It's fantastically easy to clean, just put the shaver head under the tap to wash. Bald head shaver perfect for use in the shower, you can use with gel or foam.

💗【Fast & Effective Precision Shaving Heads】Bald head shaver for men uses double-layer durable blade to accurately capture long and short hairs, which are precise, sharp and safe. The double net provides protection and reduces irritation. The intelligent induction system effectively prevents hair pinching. We promise lifetime free warranty, feel free to contact us at any time if you have any questions with this electric razor.

✨【Anti-pinch System】This razor is designed with your face and neck curves in mind, Its double-layer durable blades and upgraded 7D floating shaving system help increase your shaving area while still giving you a comfortable experience, and its skin-friendly protection system protects your skin from irritation. On top of that, its intelligent sensing battery status ensures that even when the battery is low, it can maintain stable power operation and helps to prevent hair pinching.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2024 NEW Upgrade 6D Head Shavers for Bald Men, 6-IN-1 Shaver Kit，Designed for Handsome men Why Choose Our head shavers for bald: Multifunctional bald head shaver: 1. 6D Floating Cutter Head - Electroplating shaver heads have features of anti-abrasion and durability, perfect for bald head and messy beard. 2. Nose Trimmer - The nose hair trimmer is equipped with a safety cone to guide the hair into the blades and separate the skin and the blades to avoid injury. 3. Hair Clipper with 3 Limit Combs - The hair clipper and limit combs (3mm, 5mm, 7mm) are suitable for hair & beard styling needs. 4. Facial Clean Brush - The facial brush is massage the face, soften stubbles, and clean pores and residual hair after shaving. 5. Facial Massage Brush - The massage brush helps to soften the stubble for sensitive skin before shaving.

Why Choose Our Head Shavers for Bald? Multifunctional Bald Head Shaver：5 detachable attachments,meet all your needs for hair trimming and facial care. IPX7 Waterproof： Wet or dry use, with beard cream or not, enjoy your smooth shaving even in the shower. USB Fast Charging & LED Display：USB fast charging, smart LED display with travel lock, available time and shaved time.

Electric Razor for Bald Men The head attachment is designed with a novel magnetic interface. Cleaning is easier and more convenient, while greater hair storage capacity without tugging hassles. Upgraded 6-head shaver, increase the shaving area and save time. Equipped with dual rings and anti-trap blades, this men's razor captures accurately even short beards, so you never have to worry about nicks, infections, ingrowns, and irritations. The 6D flexible shaving heads glide smoothly over the curves and contours of the head and face without causing pain or irritation.
Nice gift for your husband or boyfriend Waterproof level: IPX7 full body washable Charging time: 1.5 Hour Working time,90 minutes Battery capacity：600mAhPower: 5W

Package Contents: 1 x Electric Head Razor 1 x Hair Clipper 1 x Facial Cleaning Brush 1 x Facial Massage Brush 1 x Nose Trimmer 3 x Guide Combs (3mm, 5mm, 7mm) 1 x USB Charging Cable (NO USB adapter) 1 x Instruction Manual Warming Tip--The electric head razor come with USB cable WITHOUT adapter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect shaving experience for bald men!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 9D Electric Head Shaver and I must say it has exceeded all my expectations. As a bald man, finding the right shaving product is crucial, and this shaver ticks all the boxes. From its exceptional performance to its user-friendly design, this shaver has truly transformed my shaving routine. The performance of the 9D Electric Head Shaver is outstanding. Its powerful motor effortlessly glides over my head, leaving behind a smooth and clean shave every time. The precision blades ensure a close shave without any nicks or irritation. I am truly impressed with how efficiently it removes even the shortest of hairs, resulting in a perfectly smooth finish. One of the standout features of this shaver is its ergonomic design. The handle fits comfortably in my hand, allowing for a firm grip throughout the shaving process. The shaver is lightweight, making it easy to maneuver and reach every contour of my head. The flexible shaving head adjusts to the shape of my scalp, ensuring a comfortable and irritation-free experience. The 9D Electric Head Shaver offers a range of shaving options to suit individual preferences. With its multiple speed settings, I can adjust the intensity of the shave according to my needs. The shaver also comes with different attachments, allowing me to trim my beard or sideburns effortlessly. This versatility makes it a fantastic all-in-one grooming tool. I am impressed with the battery life of this shaver. It holds a charge for a significant amount of time, allowing me to complete multiple shaves without needing to recharge. This is especially convenient for those who travel frequently or simply prefer a hassle-free shaving experience. In conclusion, the 9D Electric Head Shaver has proven to be the ultimate shaving companion for bald men. Its exceptional performance, comfort, versatility, and long battery life make it stand out among the competition. I highly recommend this shaver to anyone looking for a top-notch grooming tool that delivers flawless results every time. It has certainly earned its well-deserved 5-star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handsomemen Brand Head Saver
reviews.reviewText: This head shaver is for me without any debt, I have tried so many shavers for the last 30 years, but none match this little but so effective and amazing smooth shaver.This shaver comes with a 6-in-1 grooming kit which includes a nose hair and beard trimmer, it's rechargeable, therefore, no need to use any battery, so it's sustainable and environmentally safe.It is very comfortable and easy to use and it cancels the myth of No Pain No Gain since there is no pain and plenty of smooth skin to have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little shaver!
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing little shaver for the price. I was hesitant to try it but am so glad that I did. It shaves my head well and I no longer have to worry about nicks and bleeding. I have had brain d surgery in the past and actual razors cut my scars and raised area quite easily. This doesn’t and it works so well. The battery lasts a long time as well and since it is cordless it is great in the shower.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfect for baldness
reviews.reviewText: It worked well to conform to my head. And there were a great selection of attachments to perform any other trimming possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use on my bald head
reviews.reviewText: My wife got me this razor three months ago to use on my head. I have a beard, so I haven't used it on my face. I use the razor every few days to keep my head smooth. It is really easy to clean. The six razor heads move to get all angles. It is more convenient than using a razor in the shower. I hadn't though about buying an electric razor, but I'm glad my wife did.

reviews.reviewText: It effortlessly took all the hair off my head cleaned up my beard. It charged up USB last for about one hour and a half, easy-to-use to maintain. I'm enjoying mine, go get your own. It's very affordable.
